rdf:Description.dc:title: The Tour: A Story of Ancient Egypt
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Louis Marie Anne Couperus (1863–1923)
Alexander Teixeira de Mattos (1865–1921)
rdf:Description.dc:rights:

Translation of Antiek toerisme. Roman uit Oud-Egypte, 1911.
Scans of this book are available from the Internet Archive. (US edition, copy 1, 2, UK edition.) The text is produced from the UK edition, however, the front-cover is taken from the US edition.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Egypt -- Fiction.
rdf:Description.dc:description: A rich Roman, Publius Lucius Sabinus, travels to Egypt during the reign of emperor Tiberius to find some distraction after the loss of his favourite female slave...
